LanguageData.BS_NaturalPsychic.label: nature attuned
LanguageData.BS_NaturalPsychic.description: Carriers of this gene are highly attuned to the natural magics and highly capable of dispelling arcane load. They are noticeably worse at utilizing magical-enhancing gear and implants however.
